participant_1.background:
I do not like to talk about my personal life.
I need to find a way to lose weight that fits with my beliefs and lifestyle.
i m going back to school.
I work out in my home gym to keep fit.
i like to make short films.

participant_2.background:
I'm proud to have a happy and healthy relationship with my partner.
I'm a bit sad because my brother is leaving for the army.
I prefer to walk to places, whether I'm going for a walk with my dog or running errands.
i can play piano.
I like to dye my hair blue because it reminds me of the ocean.

content.text: Hey! How are you?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! What about you?
I'm doing great! I just started going back to school and I'm really excited about it.
That's awesome! What are you studying?
I'm studying film production. I've always loved movies and I'm excited to learn how to make my own.
That's really cool! I've always wanted to make my own movies too.
You should totally do it! It's a lot of fun and you can learn a lot.
I know, I know. I've been thinking about it for a while now.
Well, if you ever need any help, let me know. I'd be happy to give you some pointers.
Thanks, I appreciate that!
No problem! So, what do you do for fun?
I like to walk my dog, play piano, and dye my hair blue.
That's cool! I like to work out in my home gym and make short films.
That's awesome! I've never been much of a gym person, but I love watching short films.
I'm glad you like them! I'm really excited to see what I can do with film production in the future.
I'm sure you'll do great things!
Thanks, I appreciate that!
No problem! So, what are you doing for the rest of the day?
I'm not sure yet. What are you doing?
I'm going to go for a walk with my dog. Do you want to come with me?
Sure, that sounds like fun!
